content.text: I'm doing okay, I'm a bit busy with school but I'm looking forward to the weekend. What do you like to do on the weekend?
I like to go to comic con with my husband. We have a lot of fun and we always get to see some really cool stuff. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to cook. I'm a big fan of classic comfort food, like macaroni and cheese. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I like to make classical music. I used to work in my family's restaurant, so I learned how to cook a lot of different dishes.
That's really cool! I'm not very good at music. Do you have any other hobbies?
I also have a secret bank account that I use to buy things that my parents would disapprove of. Do you have any secrets?
No, I don't really have any secrets. I try to be pretty open with everyone.
That's good. It's nice to be able to be honest with people.
Yeah, it is. What do you do for work?
I work full time. I'm a nurse.
That's a great job. I'm glad you're able to help people.
Thanks. I like it. It's rewarding.
